title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table display differently between a dynamic text item and a data/text item, but the expected behavior is not specified.
EB: When inputting 'new Date()' as the content for three items and saving, the dynamic text item should display the same format as the data and text item.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item. 2. Specify 'new Date()' as the content for all three items. 3. Save and preview the page to observe the discrepancy in formatting between the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
